channel.title: type traits on phiysng
channel.description: Recent content in type traits on phiysng

item.title: Cpp_type_traits
item.description: C++的类型特征(type traits) CppCon /// <summary> /// template meta programming /// </summary> namespace tpl { template<int N> struct abs { static constexpr int value = N < 0 ? (-N) : N; }; template< unsigned M, unsigned N> struct gcd { static int const value = gcd<N, M% N>::value; }; /// <summary> /// partial specialized version gcd(M,0) = M /// </summary> template<unsigned M> struct gcd< M, 0> { static_assert(M != 0); static int const value = M; }; /// <summary> /// rank base condition.
